title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout in build 2002071610021.
OB: When the delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is incorrectly moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: After pressing the delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted without affecting the position of the Launch item, which should stay on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application. 
2. Navigate to the coolbar. 
3. Press the delete button. 
4. Observe the layout and notice that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is incorrectly moved to the first row.
